civilopediaText.text: Neia Baraja stands before a crowd of citizens and soldiers of Sorcerer Kingdom. Her voice clear and strong. She announced The Proclamation of Absolute Justice.

choices.text: In the name of all believers, we proclaim a new truth. And from this truth, we derive our sacred doctrine.

civilopediaText.text: Neia Baraja kneel before Ainz Ooal Gown. Ainz bless her and give Ultimate Shooting Star Super to her permanently. He wish her happiness and prosperity to all her descendants.
